snippet.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Silver Phantom Trailer
snippet.description:
A completely new Virtual Reality (VR) film.
“Mobile Suit Gundam: Silver Phantom”
────────────────────────
“Mobile Suit Gundam: Silver Phantom” is a whole new film experience allowing users to enter the world of Gundam in VR.
A coproduction project with Atlas V, whom have been creating various VR titles. To be released this 2024 Fall, for Meta Quest

#VRFilm #GUNDAM
